name: In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of Carl Giesler and Anne Giesler, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of Carl GIESLER and Anne Giesler, H/W. In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of James E. Miller and Mary C. Miller, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of James MILLER and Mary Miller, H/W
name_abbreviation: In re Philadelphia Electric Co. Right of Way

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAP AD ANOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of Carl Giesler and Anne Giesler, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of Carl GIESLER and Anne Giesler, H/W. In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of James E. Miller and Mary C. Miller, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of James MILLER and Mary Miller, H/W.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of October, 1992, the Order of the Commonwealth Court dismissing the appeal is reversed. See Appeal of Borough of Churchill, 525 Pa. 80, 575 A.2d 550 (1990). The appeal is reinstated and the case is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for a decision on the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Peter A. Mardinly, Media, for appellants.
Henry B. FitzPatrick, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
614 A.2d 238
In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of Carl Giesler and Anne Giesler, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of Carl GIESLER and Anne Giesler, H/W. In re PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC CO. RIGHT OF WAY; Taking of Ground of James E. Miller and Mary C. Miller, H/W, in the Borough of Chester Heights. Appeal of James MILLER and Mary Miller, H/W.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 25, 1990.
Decided Oct. 9, 1992.
Peter A. Mardinly, Media, for appellants.
Henry B. FitzPatrick, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAP AD ANOS and CAPPY, JJ.
